scripts.build-after: npm run build-clean && npm run build-copy && npm run build-create-pages
scripts.build-copy: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/* build/*.* build/static/css/*.* build/static/js/*.* build/static/media/*.* ../../docs
scripts.build-create-pages: npm run create-main && npm run create-json-viewer && npm run create-json-formatter && npm run create-text-differences && npm run create-translit-from-russian-to-english && npm run create-unit-converter && npm run create-loan-calculator && npm run create-guid-generator && npm run create-url-encode-decode && npm run create-html-encode-decode && npm run create-base64-encode-decode && npm run create-md5-generator && npm run create-sha1-generator && npm run create-sha256-generator
scripts.create-json-viewer: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/json-viewer && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Json Viewer - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/json-viewer/index.html
scripts.create-json-formatter: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/json-formatter && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Json Formatter - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/json-formatter/index.html
scripts.create-text-differences: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/text-differences && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Finding Differences Between Texts - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/text-differences/index.html
scripts.create-translit-from-russian-to-english: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/translit-from-russian-to-english && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Translint From Russian To English - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/translit-from-russian-to-english/index.html
scripts.create-unit-converter: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/unit-converter && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Unit Converter - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/unit-converter/index.html
scripts.create-loan-calculator: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/loan-calculator && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Loan Calculator - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/loan-calculator/index.html
scripts.create-guid-generator: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/guid-generator && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Guid Generator - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/guid-generator/index.html
scripts.create-url-encode-decode: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/url-encode-decode && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Url Encode/Decode - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/url-encode-decode/index.html
scripts.create-html-encode-decode: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/html-encode-decode && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Html Encode/Decode - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/html-encode-decode/index.html
scripts.create-base64-encode-decode: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/base64-encode-decode && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Base64 Encode/Decode Text - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/base64-encode-decode/index.html
scripts.create-base64-encode-file-or-image: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/base64-encode-file-or-image && replace-in-file {Title} "Online Base64 Encode File Or Image - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/base64-encode-file-or-image/index.html
scripts.create-md5-generator: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/md5-generator && replace-in-file {Title} "Online MD5 Generator - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/md5-generator/index.html
scripts.create-sha1-generator: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/sha1-generator && replace-in-file {Title} "Online SHA1 Generator - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/sha1-generator/index.html
scripts.create-sha256-generator: copyfiles -V -u 1 build/index.html ../../docs/tools/sha256-generator && replace-in-file {Title} "Online SHA256 Generator - Olrix Tools" ../../docs/tools/sha256-generator/index.html
